main.title: how do you want to pay?

title.full-payment-title: pay your invoice entry {{value}} with Pix

accordion.content: You can pay by scanning a QR code. Then, enter the amount to be paid and confirm the transaction, which will be completed in seconds. To pay with a card, choose this option in the Woovi app, enter the card details (number, expiration date, security code), and confirm the transaction.

qrcode.alert-success: Copied QRCODE to clipboard with success!

error: Something went wrong, please try again
